channel.title: Code Reels - Interview Questions
channel.description: Daily AI-generated technical interview questions for system design, algorithms, frontend, backend, DevOps, and more.

item.title: 1 New Questions Added
item.description:
Daily AI-powered question generation added 1 new questions across 1 channels.
Sample questions: • What is the difference between XSS and CSRF attacks?

item.title: 1 New Questions Added
item.description:
Daily AI-powered question generation added 1 new questions across 4 channels.
Sample questions: • Explain the event sourcing pattern and its key benefits in distributed systems?

item.title: 16 New Questions Added
item.description:
Daily AI-powered question generation added 16 new questions across 19 channels.
Sample questions: • How would you design a message queue system that guarantees exactly-once delivery while maintaining high throughput for real-time event processing? • What's the difference between REST, GraphQL, and gRPC in terms of protocol and data format? • How would you optimize a time-series analytics query that scans 100M+ rows across multiple date partitions when the WHERE clause cannot be pruned effectively? • What is the primary difference between Ansible, Puppet, and Chef in configuration management? • Your microservice has a 99.9% availability SLO over 30 days with a 1-hour burn rate alert threshold. If you experience a 10-minute outage at 10% traffic impact followed by a 5-minute outage at 100% traffic impact, what's your remaining error budget and should you trigger the burn rate alert?

item.title: 25 New Questions Added
item.description:
Daily AI-powered question generation added 25 new questions across 26 channels.
Sample questions: • How does Raft consensus algorithm ensure leader election and log replication in distributed systems? • How would you implement a React useMemo hook to optimize a recursive Fibonacci function with memoization, and what are the key trade-offs between top-down memoization vs bottom-up tabulation in this context? • What is a closure in JavaScript and how does it enable data encapsulation? • How would you implement JWT authentication with RS256 signing and refresh token rotation to prevent token replay attacks? • How does MongoDB's document structure differ from SQL's table rows for storing user data?

item.title: 18 Questions Improved
item.description:
AI-powered improvement bot enhanced 18 questions with better explanations and diagrams.
Sample questions: • How do Incident Response Playbooks automate security incident workflows using predefined procedures and role-based actions? • How do different load balancing algorithms distribute traffic across servers, and what are the trade-offs between performance and resource utilization? • How does React's Virtual DOM diffing algorithm work during reconciliation, and what role do keys play in optimizing list updates? • How do cloud migration tools automate application and data transfer between on-premise and cloud environments? • How does a Service Catalog enable self-service infrastructure provisioning in an Internal Developer Platform?

item.title: 25 New Questions Added
item.description:
Daily AI-powered question generation added 25 new questions across 25 channels.
Sample questions: • How would you design a multi-tier caching strategy with cache warming, invalidation, and fallback for a 99.9% availability e-commerce platform? • Given a directed weighted graph with up to 10^6 edges and frequent edge weight updates, design a data structure that supports dynamic shortest path queries with sub-millisecond response time? • How would you implement a custom useDebounce hook that works with React's concurrent features and prevents stale closures? • How would you implement eventual consistency in a multi-region DynamoDB application with write conflicts? • How would you design a GitOps multi-cluster deployment strategy using ArgoCD that handles blue-green deployments with zero-downtime rollback across 50+ clusters while maintaining state consistency?

item.title: 27 New Questions Added
item.description:
Daily AI-powered question generation added 27 new questions across 27 channels.
Sample questions: • How would you implement session affinity (sticky sessions) in HAProxy while maintaining high availability, and what are the trade-offs compared to stateless load balancing? • How would you implement a thread-safe LRU cache using a HashMap and DoublyLinkedList, considering eviction policy and O(1) operations? • How would you implement a performance budget system that automatically detects bundle regressions and enforces lazy-loading boundaries in a large-scale React application? • How does the Saga pattern handle distributed transactions across multiple microservices? • What is the difference between READ COMMITTED and REPEATABLE READ isolation levels in database transactions?

item.title: Code Reels Launch
item.description: Initial release with 185+ questions across 20 channels
